values: Shame is a bad feeling about things one has done wrong.
The boy felt shame about misplacing his clothes.

To shame is to cause someone to feel embarrassed or guilty about something they have done.
Shame is a feeling of guilt or embarrassment caused by doing something wrong or inappropriate.
